Ez a játék remekül fejleszti a reflexeket és arra ösztönöz, hogy  jobb együttműködni. Sajnos amióta a játék ingyenes lett, megnövekedett a csalók száma, ami nagyon elkeserített engem. Ennek ellenére én ajánlom a játékot körülbelül mindenkinek. Ha úgy döntesz kipróbálod, sok sikert és jó szórakozást.

I like the game play of counter Strike global offensive if I have to specific.
Recently I just started playing less because the graphics is increasing with every update and I'm getting less and less fps. So its just that it feels like continuous lagging with high graphics and with low graphics it just doesn't feel like before.
And one more thing is that hackers are annoying and I encounter one or more every time I try to play and its just depressing.
It has been so many years since CSGO anti cheat program came but still developers can not solve it.
Just a day before yesterday "I encountered a hacker that I could not report even if I tried", it seems like some new type of cheat where no one can report the cheater.
